C

Character - Class in scripts
This abstract class serves as the base model for creating the two character types in the game: PacMan and Ghost.
Character(int[], int[]) - Constructor for class scripts.Character
Constructs a new Character instance, used as the base model for both PacMan and Ghost.
CharacterActions - Interface in scripts
Defines the core actions that any character in the game must implement.Like being moved or teleported.
checkCollisionAndMove(String[][]) - Method in interface scripts.CharacterActions
Checks for collisions and updates the character's position on the game board.
checkCollisionAndMove(String[][]) - Method in class scripts.Ghost
Moves the ghost by selecting a random valid direction at each crossroad.
checkCollisionAndMove(String[][]) - Method in class scripts.PacMan
This method is used to moved pac-man across the map based on the input of user and collisions with walls
checkGameOver(PacMan, Ghost[], Timer, GUI, int, int, String[][]) - Method in class scripts.GameEvents
Checks if Pac-Man has lost by verifying collisions between Pac-Man and ghosts.
checkVictory(PacMan, Ghost[], GUI, String[][]) - Method in class scripts.GameEvents
Checks whether the player has achieved victory by scanning the game board for remaining food tiles.
convertToArrayOfArrays(ArrayList<String[]>) - Static method in class scripts.MatrixFromFileExtractor
Converts an ArrayList of string arrays into a 2D string array.
currentCoordinatesXY - Variable in class scripts.Character
The current (x, y) coordinates of the character on the game board.
currentDirectionXY - Variable in class scripts.Character
The current movement direction of the character, represented as a vector (x, y).
